meanings.definition: Sound system that uses two or more channels to create a more realistic audio experience.
meanings.sent1: The stereo in the car made the music sound like it was all around us.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new stereo for my room to listen to music more clearly.
meanings.sent3: The stereo at the party was so loud that we could feel the music in our bones.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a stereo, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The stereo at the concert was so powerful, it felt like the music was alive.

meanings.definition: Device that plays music or sound through two separate speakers.
meanings.sent1: The stereo in the living room played our favorite songs all day.
meanings.sent2: I saved up to buy a new stereo for my bedroom.
meanings.sent3: The stereo in the movie theater was so clear, it felt like the actors were in the room.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the room like a stereo, reaching every corner.
meanings.sent5: The stereo in the car made the road trip more enjoyable with its music.

meanings.definition: Having to do with sound that is recorded or played back using two separate channels.
meanings.sent1: The stereo recording captured the concert perfectly.
meanings.sent2: I prefer stereo headphones to hear music in both ears.
meanings.sent3: The stereo sound in the movie made it feel like we were in the scene.
meanings.sent4: Her stereo voice filled the room, captivating everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The stereo effect in the movie made the action scenes more intense.
